name: Dicing
description:
ROll Of The Dice
That was the theme of GMTK Game jam 2022...

So that's exactly what I did...But YOU are the dice

Find your way out of the floating Islands by dodging the Red Dices and collecting the Golden ones...

Now Go...and Roll your way out of there

Credit:

Default Gallery.3 by Yogoshimo 2.0 , via Poly Pizza

Floating place by Ben Desai , via Poly Pizza

Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
